parameters.name: BindMiniProgram
parameters.description:
Whether to enable binding of the mini program:
- **Y**: Enable
- **N (default)**: Not enabled

parameters.name: CheckFileBody
parameters.description: Content of the uploaded verification file.

parameters.name: CheckFileName
parameters.description: Name of the uploaded verification file.

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description:
Binding platform for the mini program:
- **WECHAT**: WeChat
- **ALIPAY**: Alipay
- **TIKTOK**: TikTok

parameters.name: StoreImage
parameters.description:
Whether to deliver the files generated from the authentication to the customer's OSS:
- **Y**: Yes
- **N**: No
